game.name: Koltera 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Gather resources, craft items, and grow a team of creatures in this relaxed incremental idler RPG. Automate your skills, send creatures on expeditions, and keep progressing even while offline.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gather resources, craft items, and grow a team of creatures in this relaxed incremental idler RPG. Automate your skills, send creatures on expeditions, and keep progressing even while offline.
